title: Historic & Charming Corner 1-Bdrm at 2300 Harriet!
posting_body: ['Historic & Charming Front Corner 1 Bdrm at the Harriet Apts #102', 'Property Address', '2300 Harriet Ave - 102 | Minneapolis, MN 55405', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'At Home Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'You will love living at the Harriet Apartments!', 'This historic brownstone building is a true charmer and a must-see tucked away on a gorgeous tree-lined street in the popular Whittier Neighborhood.', 'All types of commuters will enjoy having everything you need within walking or biking distance.', 'The Greenway path is just a few blocks down Lyndale Ave, and there are many Metro Transit stops in the vicinity.', 'There is also no shortage of great coffee shops, great food, and other great local attractions to enjoy!', "These one-bedroom apartments are classic homes with great character that have been well maintained from the 1920's.", 'The hardwood floors, original wood trim and molding, and original built-in cabinets keep the history alive and give the apartment a charming look.', 'Apartment #102 is a corner apartment on the front of the building, facing Harriet Avenue, and has plenty of windows for great natural light.', "Plenty of closet space throughout, and a large bedroom will keep you comfortable and organized- even if you're working from home.", 'The building has unlimited coin-less laundry ($20/month for 1 resident, $25/month for 2), free storage lockers, and free bike storage, and has been wired for fiber optic internet with USI.', 'Cats are welcome with a $200 refundable deposit, $200 1-time pet fee, and monthly pet rent of $35/month per cat (max 2).', 'Heat is included in rent.', '**$150 Administration fee due at lease signing**', 'Check out our virtual tour of a corner one bedroom at 2300 Harriet:', '<URL>', 'County: Hennepin • School District: Minneapolis', 'Set up your tour today!', 'Give us a call at', 'show contact info', 'to view this apartment!', 'View more properties at <URL>', 'Note: Apartment photo(s) in this listing are a representation of the property and may not be the exact photos of this available apartment.', 'Amenities', 'Online Resident Portal - Rent Payments and $600.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
